number.description: This filter will always parse any number given to Arabic number.

currency.description: This filter add the currency sign 'SAR' to the passed value.

money.description: This an alis for currency filter

snake_case.description: This filter replaces each space in a given string with an underscore character, and the first letter of each word written in lowercase.

camel_case.description: This filter removes each spaces or punctuation in a given string, indicating the separation of words with a single capitalized letter, and the first word starting with either case. Common examples include "iPhone" and "eBay".

studly_case.description: Also known as PascalCase, which implies that the first capital of each subword is capitalized.

kabab_case.description: This filter replaces the spaces between words with a dash.

date.description: This filter overrides the default date filter given with Twig. It formats a date to a given format with concidering the page's selected language.

time_ago.description: This filter shows the time of and action exectution, for example "Comment created 10 minutes ago "
